description: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of a wide body forage wagon to its Agassiz Research and Development Centre in Agassiz, B.C on or before 2023-03-31.
full_summary:
=======

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

### Title (English) / Titre (French)

01555-230402 Forage Wagon / 01555-230402 Remorque à fourrages

### Reference Number

WS3726785336-Doc3753440552

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this *Request for Proposal* (RFP) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) for the supply and delivery of a wide body forage wagon to the Agassiz Research and Development Centre in Agassiz, British Columbia.

### Key Details

* **UNSPSC**: 25170000 - Transportation components and systems
* **Procurement Category**: GD - Government of Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia
* **Expected Delivery Date**: March 31, 2023

### Requirements

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) requires the supply and delivery of a wide body forage wagon to its Agassiz Research and Development Centre.

### Evaluation Criteria

* **Lowest Price**

### Contact Information

Clara Dumay (SPAC/PSPC)

clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Important Documents

* Tender Description and Instructions to Bidders
* Terms and Conditions
* Specifications

Please note that the tender will be *cancelled* unless otherwise specified.

### Notice URL

<http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14656050?extsite=MTQ2NTYwNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Closing Date and Time

December 9, 2022 at 14:00:00 AST

We encourage potential bidders to review the tender documentation in its entirety to understand the full scope of this procurement.
